tasks.task_description: Create fast-agent service module for external endpoint communication
Create fast-agent request interceptor to handle requests before current system
Integrate fast-agent interceptor into existing chat API route
Add fast-agent configuration and environment setup
Test integration with existing system fallback

description: Integrate fast-agent as a modular enhancement to binG's existing LLM chat interface, adding advanced tools, file handling, agent chaining, and MCP tools support
context: Created fast-agent service module with external endpoint communication, health checking, request filtering, and configuration management. The service can detect advanced use cases and route them to fast-agent while maintaining fallback capabilities.

Created fast-agent request interceptor that intelligently routes requests to fast-agent before falling back to original system. Includes streaming response simulation and proper error handling with fallback mechanisms.

Integrated fast-agent interceptor into existing chat API route. The interceptor now acts as the first-choice handler, checking for advanced use cases and routing to fast-agent before falling back to the original system. Supports both streaming and non-streaming responses.
Added fast-agent configuration to .env file with all necessary environment variables and created comprehensive documentation explaining the integration, configuration, usage, and troubleshooting.

Created comprehensive test script to verify fast-agent integration and fallback functionality. The script tests routing logic, fallback behavior, and API health. Added test command to package.json for easy execution.
